stack:stack.stack:script: find /export/stack/pallets/* -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} \; find /export/stack/carts/* -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} \;

import os import os.path import sys import stack.roll
if not os.path.exists('/tmp/rolls.xml'): sys.exit()
generator = stack.roll.Generator() generator.parse('/tmp/rolls.xml')
found = [] for name, version, release, arch, url, diskid in generator.rolls: purl = '%s/%s/%s/%s/%s/%s/' % (url, name, version, release, 'redhat', arch) cmd = '/opt/stack/bin/stack' os.system('%s add pallet %s' % (cmd,purl)) os.system('%s enable pallet %s' % (cmd,name))
